timeline.bodyText:
What do you think about inlining such maps creation and also extract each key-value pair on a separate lines:
final MvcResult mvcResult = performRequest(get(ENTITIES_URL)
                                           .params(multiValueMapOf(IDENTIFIER, TEST_STRING,
                                                                   ACL_CLASS, AclClass.DATA_STORAGE));
timeline.author: tcibinan
